title: TIB Subscriber Info
description:
This applications are used to manipulate TIB Subscriber Info. It is available in our latest version 5.2.

 

Implementation details:

  • Trusted mode is supported and i_customer (integer) parameter should be supplied in this case.
  • Only root customer is allowed to use the API.


tibGetSubscriberInfo()

Get TIB Subscriber Info value.


Parameters:

  • i_account - account id. Integer. Mandatory.

Returns:

  • result - 'OK'. means that operation was successful. String. 
  • subscriber - structure containing:
    • subscriber_id - current value. String.
    • service_id - current value. String.


  • XMLRPC fault in case of any error. 


tibSetSubscriberInfo()

Set TIB Subscriber Info value.


Parameters:

  • i_account - account id. Integer. Mandatory.
  • subscriber_id - new value. String. Mandatory.
  • service_id - new value. String. Mandatory.

Returns:

  • result - 'OK'. means that operation was successful. String.


  • XMLRPC fault in case of any error.
